hotelchain

Class GuestRegistrationTextInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.TextInterface
      • hotelchain.GuestRegistrationTextInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReservationManagerTextInterface

    public class GuestRegistrationTextInterface
extends TextInterface
    Provides a text-based user interface towards a Hotel Chain's guest registration system. Extends TextInterface for basic text-based user interface functionality.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen

      • showFindGuestID

        protected int showFindGuestID(java.lang.String nameEntered)
        Finds a guest ID based on a given name. If multiple matches, asks for guest selection.
        Parameters:
        nameEntered - Name of guest to be found
        Returns:
        Returns a guest ID as indicated by user input.

      • showAddNewGuest

        Parameters:
        showHeader - Indicates whether the header of this screen should be printed.
